fullplot: Urban Legends: The Final Cut follows Amy Mayfield (Morrison), a student at Alpine University who struggles to complete her thesis film on urban legends - only to have her crew members fall prey to fatal 'accidents.' Suspicious, Amy investigates and discovers a much more sinister hand at work. Now she must unmask the killer before she, too, becomes an urban legend.
plot: Urban legend-style killings begin to occur on a movie set, in this non-sequel sequel to "Urban Legend".
title: Urban Legends: Final Cut

tomatoes.consensus: This teen horror movie brings nothing new to an already exhausted genre. And it's bad. Really bad.
